tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ForecastAccuracy (
    id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    actual_value DECIMAL,
    forecasted_value DECIMAL,
    forecasting_error DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE sales_data (
  sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  date DATE,
  product_id INT,
  quantity INT,
  unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
